messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Carschooling, Vacations and Cars (oh my!)
messages.msgSnippet: She also has a website and yahoo group to go along with the book if you are interested. Elaine http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CarSchooling/ GAMES ACTIVITIES FOR
messages.messageBody:
She also has a website and yahoo group to go along with the book if you are
interested.

Elaine


http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CarSchooling/

GAMES ACTIVITIES FOR LEARNING IN THE CAR - ON THE ROAD!

The author of the book, Carschooling: Over 350 Entertaining Games and
Activities to Turn Travel Time Into Learning Time, Diane Flynn Keith, invites you to
join this list and learn what carschooling is all about, while getting tons of
innovative, fun, and highly educational activities that will help you turn
your kids into "Road Scholars." For more information about Carschooling visit:
WWW.CARSCHOOLING.COM. Join this list and get tips on how to use the world as
your classroom whether driving in the car on a 500 mile road trip or running a
5-minute errand. Share ideas for learning every subject required by national
curriculum standards in the car. Taking a trip? Ask our list members for
suggestions on educational places to visit along the way. Join us and get on the real
information super-highway!

Some of the activities and resources posted to this list have been included
in Carschooling workshops presented by the list owner, in Carschooling articles
written for publication in various formats, and in a new book titled
CarschoolingÂ® - Over 350 Entertaining Activities To Turn Travel Time Into Learning
Time by Diane Flynn Keith that is now available (published by Three Rivers Press,
a division of Random House). When you join this list you are giving
permission for your posts to be used in workshops, articles, and in future editions of
"Carschooling."

Visit WWW.CARSCHOOLING.COM for lots of FREE information and road-tested games
your family will love!

*Note: Car Schooling (Carschooling) is a Registered Trademark of Diane Flynn
Keith and may not be used without written permission. For information email:
Editor@...




In a message dated 5/18/2004 2:17:04 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
agar11@... writes:
With summer approaching and the possibility of more traveling in the
car, I offer a book I stumbled on at the Scholastic sale. It's
called "Carschooling" by Diane Flynn Keith. This is a terrific book
full of ideas for unschooling on the road (and lots of facts I didn't
know, either). Look for it at any bookstore or amazon.com or
half.com -
Carschooling by Diane Flynn Keith

"two thumbs up, with a bullet" :)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
